title: Role-Play-Based Language Learning Course for Enhancing Online Peer Feedback Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Language training program for working professionals featuring interaction-centered classes using digital tools in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze work-related language examples to identify and provide feedback on at least three key issues in peers' presentations.
Learners can propose specific and actionable improvements for peers' language use based on role-play scenarios.
Learners can revise at least two language expressions based on peer feedback to produce documents suitable for workplace contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
